channel.title: Homepage on Yamato group wiki
channel.description: Recent content in Homepage on Yamato group wiki

item.description: Usage of Wiki # This page tells how to edit this wiki. Get started Write your first article 1. Get Started # Install Git # If you haven’t installed Git yet, look here Install Hugo # This webpage is generated by Hugo. To install Hugo, you copy below and paste it to install on your machine, MacOS Windows and hugo-extended is also required.

item.title: first lesson
item.description: h1 Heading 8-) # h2 Heading # h3 Heading # h4 Heading # h5 Heading # h6 Heading # katex $h$ $$ D = \frac{1}{2} $$ Horizontal Rules # hogehoge Typographic replacements # Enable typographer option to see result. (c) (C) (r) (R) (tm) (TM) (p) (P) +- test.. test… test….. test?….. test!…. !!!!!! ???? ,, – — “Smartypants, double quotes” and ‘single quotes’

item.title: 日本語
item.description: こんにちは。 このページは日本語の表示テストです。 タイトルに日本語使えないみたいです。残念。 ちなみにkatexという仕組みでtex記法で数式を埋込むことができます。こんな感じに \(f(x) = \int_{-\infty}^\infty\hat f(\xi)\,e^{2 \pi i \xi x}\,d\xi\)
